name: The Witcher: Of Flesh and Flame Part 4
summary: Searching for a way to save Geralt from death at the hands of the Ofieri for a crime he did not commit, Dandelion attempts to resolve the conflict in his own mischievous way. Meanwhile, while Radeyah begins to assume that she is safe, there are unforeseen consequences for her actions waiting just around the corner to strike.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 作者: CD Projekt RED、Aleksandra Motyka
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 发售日: April 3, 2019
  • 作画: Marianna Strychowska
